review: I'd give this a 4.5 rating, if there was one. It's not really quite a 5, though there is a lot to recommend it. The comfortable rooms are set in a spacious property with an organic garden, though it was a little late in the season when I was there so the garden was pretty well done for the year. One special thing about the place is that it has a guest kitchen. However, it was a mess and not properly cleaned during the brief time i was there. Still, it's a good amenity. It's about a 15â€“20 minute walk from town.
name: Peregrineri

review: Awesome experience. A fabulous hotel which made my stay pleasantly and memorable. Very clean and luxurious rooms. Great landscape. Awesome food. Wonderful staff who all not only take care of your every needs but also very courteous. Very peaceful and close to nature. I would come back again for sure. Thank you Team Ayali.
name: SachinKanth
